entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
